author: Deepa H
text:
Drivers of container lorries transporting goods for export and import from Chennai Port Trust refused to withdraw their strike, demanding a permanent solution to delays in processing of containers inside the port.

Talks involving the police, trailer owners, drivers, port officials and Chennai Container Terminal Limited (CCTL) officials failed to reach a conclusion on Friday. E. Kalimuthu, secretary of the drivers and cleaners association, said though CCTL officials had agreed to speed up the processing, the drivers refused to relent.

Over 4, 000 trailers are waiting on the roads leading to the Chennai Port Trust.
title: Lorry stir continues
